PLine¶

class decodes.core.dc_pline.PLine(vertices=None, basis=None)¶

Bases: decodes.core.dc_has_pts.HasPts

a simple polyline class

__init__(vertices=None, basis=None)¶

Polyline constructor.

Parameters:
  • vertices (list) – Vertices to build the pline.
  • basis (basis) – Basis of polyline.
Returns:

Polyline.
Return type:

PLine

 
pts=[Point(i,i,i) for i in range(10)]
my_pline=PLine(pts)
edges¶

Returns the edges of a PLine.

Result :List of edges of a PLine
Return type:[Segment] 
my_pline.edges
eval(t)¶
Evaluates this PLine at the specified parameter t.
A t-value of 0 will result in a point coincident with PLine.pts[0].
A t-value of 1 will result in a point coincident with PLine.pts[-1].
Parameters:t (float) – A decimal number between [0:1]
Result :A point on the polyline.
Return type:Point 
my_pline.eval(0.5)
join(other, tol=False)¶

Joins this polyline with a given polyline.

Parameters:
  • other (PLine) – Polyline to join with this polyline.
  • tol (bool.) – Tolerance of difference.
Result :

New joined Polyline.
Return type:

PLine

 
pts_2=[Point(i+1, i, i-1) for in range(5)]
my_pline2=PLine(pts_2)

my_pline.join(my_pline2)
length¶

Returns the length of this PLine.

Result :Length of this PLine
Return type:float 
my_pline.length
near(p)¶

Returns a tuple of the closest point to a given PLine, the index of the closest segment, and the distance from the Point to the near Point.

Parameters:p (Point) – Point to look for a near Point on the PLine.
Result :Tuple of near point on PLine, index of near segment and distance from point to near point.
Return type:(Point, integer, float) 
my_pline.near(Point(1,2,3))
near_pt(p)¶

Returns the closest point to a given PLine.

Parameters:p (Point) – Point to look for a near Point on the PLine.
Result :Near point on Pline.
Return type:Point
reverse()¶

Reverses attribute changes for classes and subclasses.

Result :Polyline.
Return type:PLine
seg(index)¶

Returns a segment of this polyline.

Parameters:index (Int) – Index of the polyline’s segment
Result :Line segment
Return type:Segment 
my_pline.seg(2)
